description: Tracks all AI-generated videos from ideation to performance analytics with self-learning loop

Video ID.description: Unique identifier for each video (e.g., GRP7_LYRA_20251101)

Agent.description: Which Group 7 AI agent this video features

Status.description: Current status in the production pipeline

Batch Date.description: Date when this video batch was generated

Post Time.description: Scheduled/actual posting time to social platforms

Platforms.description: Social platforms where video was posted

Hook Text.description: Opening hook text displayed in video (first 3 seconds)

Insight Text.description: Key insight text displayed in video (middle section)

CTA Text.description: Call-to-action text displayed in video (final section)

Voiceover Script.description: Full text-to-speech script read by AI voice

Voice Model.description: ElevenLabs voice model used for this video

First Comment.description: Engagement-driving first comment posted by automation

Voice File.description: Google Drive link to generated MP3 voiceover file

Final Video.description: Google Drive link to final merged MP4 video file

Metricool Post ID.description: Metricool API post ID for tracking and analytics

TikTok URL.description: Direct link to TikTok post (once published)

Instagram URL.description: Direct link to Instagram Reel (once published)

YouTube URL.description: Direct link to YouTube Short (once published)

Views (24h).description: Total views across all platforms in first 24 hours

Views (7d).description: Total views across all platforms after 7 days

CTR (%).description: Click-through rate from video to bio/link

Completion Rate (%).description: Percentage of viewers who watched to the end

Engagement Rate (%).description: Calculated engagement rate based on interactions

Performance Score.description: Weighted performance score for ranking videos

Top Performing Hook?.description: Mark if this hook outperformed 80th percentile

Viral Threshold Met?.description: Mark if video exceeded 100K views in 7 days

GPT Concept Quality.description: Manual rating of GPT-4 generated concept quality

Learning Notes.description: What worked/failed - feed back to GPT-4 for next batch

Next Optimization.description: Specific improvements to apply in next video iteration

Cost (USD).description: Total production cost (GPT-4 + ElevenLabs + Canva + CloudConvert)

Created At.description: Timestamp when database entry was created

views.name: Performance Dashboard
views.description: Live videos ranked by performance score

views.name: By Agent
views.description: Kanban board grouped by AI agent

views.name: Learning Loop
views.description: Videos with optimization insights for GPT-4 training

Agent Performance Database.description: Link to separate database tracking cumulative agent performance metrics

Content Calendar.description: Link to master content calendar for scheduling coordination

automation_notes: This database is auto-populated by Make.com Module 11 (Notion API). Manual updates are only for Learning Notes, GPT Concept Quality, and Next Optimization fields. Analytics sync every 24 hours via Metricool webhook.
